sec.title: Basic Description of Insect Food
sec.p: The insect foods discussed in this study are foods that have insect ingredients on the market and can be presented in any form. For example: cricket biscuits, cricket bread, fried insects (such as grasshoppers, pupae, meal-worms) and so on.

Questions for attitude, subjective norm, perceived behavioral control, environmental concern, food neophobia and purchase intention. All question items are answered using a 7-point Likert scale (from strongly agree to strongly disagree).
